sources.title: Red, White and Zero
sources.description: Title: Red, White and Zero Summary: An impassive young girl is taken from her suicidal London life, back to her home in North England, on a bizarre bus trip. Seen through the poetic eye of the camera, this is a commentary of doomed British morbidity. Directed by: Lindsay Anderson Actors: Patricia Healey, Arthur Lowe, John Sharp Production Company: Holly Productions Release Date: 21 December 1979 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An impassive young girl is taken from her suicidal London life, back to her home in North England, on a bizarre bus trip. Seen through the poetic eye of the camera, this is a commentary of doomed British morbidity.
